text: Forwarded or replied to email will break your styles. Thatâ€™s just how it is unfortunately.

Hey, I set up a contact property to stuff some preformatted HTML into a few days ago, so I could display it with line breaks in an email. It was definitely working then, but today it's displaying escaped HTML instead of the raw value. Has there been some change in the last few days that would affect this? Is there some other way I can set this up (aside from creating a dozen contact properties for this)?
